alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 8:30AM CST until January 01 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Kansas, Decatur, Norton, Sheridan, Graham and Gove Counties. In Nebraska, Red Willow County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog in conjunction with melted snow refreezing on roadways may result in hazardous driving conditions within the region. Motorists are advised to use caution when traveling this morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
